card.name: Adramelech Warlock Stats
card.property: Burning Touch Quick | Melee | Flame | 1d6 | d12 5+ = Burn | Defrost

Fireweaving Once per round, at the end of her Action Phase, the Warlock may target an object up to 2 zones away. She may move a Burn condition from that object to another target object in that same zone. Smoldering Curses Enemy creature gain the Flame +1 trait if they have one or more revealed curses you control attached to them. Demonic Reward If a friendly demon attacks and damages an enemy creature with a Burn condition, it may heal one damage. Each friendly demon may only trigger this ability once per round.

card.name: Anvil Throne Warlord Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Runesmithing When an equipment comes into play attached to this mage, he may pay 1 mana to assign one Rune to it. If this equipment would be destroyed by a spell or ability an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana. Each Rune may only be assigned once per game. Battle Orders Once per round, the Warlord may pay 1 mana and cast one of the following quick command spells. The chosen spell affects all friendly soldiers in his zone at the time it is cast, and the effect lasts until the end of the round. Take Aim! - Ranged attacks gain Piercing +2; Quick March! - Gain Fast trait; Hold The Line! - Gain Armor +1 and Tough -2 trait.

card.name: Beastmaster Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6
Melee +1

Quick Summoning Once per round, the Beastmaster may summon a Level 1 animal creature spell as a quick spell. Pet When a friendly non-Legendary animal creature comes into play, you may make it your Pet. Pay mana equal to that creature's Level +1, then place the Pet marker on it. Pet gains Melee +1, Armor +1, and Life +3. Whenever Pet is in the same zone as his Beastmaster, it gains an additional Melee +1. If Pet is destroyed, you may assign the marker again in the same manner when a new animal is summoned. Battle Skill Beastmaster has the Melee +1 trait.

card.name: Druid Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Spreading Vines During the Deployment Phase, you may place a Vine marker (see rules on placement). Whenever you, or an object you control, casts a vine spell, you may target a zone containing a friendly Vine marker, or target an object in that zone, or a border of that zone. Then, destroy that marker. Treebond When a friendly tree conjuration comes into play you may choose to bond with it. Place your Treebond marker on it. You gain Innate Life +4. The Tree gains Innate Life +4, Armor +1, and Lifebond +2. If the tree is destroyed, the Treebond marker is permanently destroyed.

card.name: Elementalist Stats

property.name: MageSchoolCost
property.value: Air=1, Earth=1, Fire=1, Water=1, War=3, Nature=3, Holy=3, Arcane=3, Dark=3, Mind=3

card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Elemental Glyphs When you cast and resolve a spell in which you are trained in, you may activate the Glyph that matches the school on that spell. Each Glyph may be deactivated once per round with a mana cost to grant a benefit to the Elementalist or target friendly creature. Enchantments only activate a Glyph when revealed. Air: During the Declare Attack Step pay 3 mana for a +4 to the first effect roll. Fire: During the Declare Attack Step you may pay 3 mana to gain Melee +2 and Ranged +2 traits for the first attack. Earth: During the Upkeep Phase you may pay 2 mana to gain the Armor +2 trait until the end of the round. Water: During the Upkeep Phase you may pay 2 mana to heal 2 damage. Elemental Resonance When the Elementalist activates, you may deal X direct damage between her or target friendly elemental, sprite, or golem creature. You may use any action or attack bar on that creature until the end of the action. X = target friendly creature's level -1.

card.name: Forcemaster Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Force Pull 1 | Quick | Range 1-2 Once per round, she may cast this quick force spell. Target creature is Pushed 1 zone TOWARDS her. Will not Push a creature through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait.

Deflect The Forcemaster uses telekinesis to deflect attacks. She has a Defense which can be used once per round, and avoids attacks on a roll of 7+. She may pay 1 mana each time she uses this Defense (before rolling for the Defense). This Defense uses its own unique ready marker: "Deflect".

card.name: Johktari Beastmaster Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6
Fast

Wounded Prey Once per round, before or after any friendly creature Action Phase, she may place her Wounded Prey marker on an enemy damage non-Mage Living creature. She, and all friendly animal creatures, gain the Melee +1 trait when attacking this creature. The marker is returned to her if the creature has no damage on it, or is destroyed. Sprinting She has the Fast trait. Archery Skill She has Ranged +1 trait for all of her non-spell ranged attacks.

card.name: Monk Stats
card.property: Straight Punch Quick | Melee | 3d6

card.name: Necromancer Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Plague Master The Necromancer has the Poison Immunity trait. During the Upkeep Phase, for each object with one or more poison condition markers on it, the Necromancer may pay 1 mana to place 1 direct poison damage on that object. Eternal Servant When a friendly non-Legendary, non-Epic, undead creature comes into play, you may make it your Eternal Servant. Its attacks gain Piercing +1. Place the Eternal Servant marker on it. If this creature is destroyed, you may pay mana equal to its casting cost to Reanimate it. You may place the marker on this creature again when it comes into play, or save it to reassign.

card.name: Paladin Stats
card.property: Basic Melee Attack Quick | Melee | 3d6

Valor Once per round, when the Paladin melee attacks and damages the strongest enemy creature, he gains 1 Valor. Divine Auras As a quick action, the Paladin may gain an aura of his choice. Each aura has its own cost in Valor. Chivalrous Challenge During the Upkeep Phase, the Paladin may place his Challenge Marker on a target enemy creature within 2 zones. Once per round, the Paladin and his Challenged enemy may re-roll any number of their attack dice while melee attacking each other. If the Challenged enemy attacks any other object, gain 1 Valor. When the Challenged enemy is destroyed, return the marker to the Paladin. During the Upkeep Phase you may pay 2 Valor to return the Challenge marker from an enemy creature.

Each round, the first time it attacks an enemy creature, who attaked and damaged another friendly creature or Holy conjuration that round, it gains Melee +2 and Piercing +1 for that attack. If it is destroyed, you may assign the marker again in the same manner. Malakai's Fire Once per round, if the Priest attacks and damages an enemy creature with an attack which deals light damage, he may place a Burn condition on that creature.

property.name: Flavor Text

Mind Mage Only

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Share the burden with me so that I may conduct righteous deeds in your honor." Hymn of the Prostrated

Beastmaster Only

card.name: Ring of Curses
card.property: Ring
Warlock Only

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Dedication to Moloch has its benefits. With this ring, I find my curses easier to prepare and of deadlier effect."

card.name: Ring of Healing
card.property: Ring

Whenever a spell cast by this Mage, or an enchantment controled by this Mage, provides healing for an object, other than the Regenerate trait, he may increase that amount of healing by one. He may use this ability once per round. If he heals multiple objects (such as with a Group Heal), he only gets the +1 bonus for one object of his choice.

card.name: Ring of the Ocean's Depths
card.property: Ring
Water Mage Only

Siren Only

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The Merren are attuned to the subtle movement of the tides, and their Mages have harnessed them to great advantage.

Familiar Legendary Dark Mage Only

card.name: Akiro's Hammer
card.property: Boulder Ranged 2-3 | 8d6 | Can only target Corporeal Conjurations Rock Storm Ranged 2-3 | Zone Attack | 3d6 | Unavoidable
Zone Exclusive Flame +2 Legendary Warlord Only

card.name: Altar of Carnage
card.property: Zone Exclusive Legendary War Mage Only Epic
Whenever a friendly soldier attacks and damages an enemy creature, you may place 1 mana on a friendly Spawnpoint or Familiar. Each friendly soldier may only trigger this ability once per round.

card.name: Altar of Domination
card.property: Zone Exclusive Burnproof Warlord Only Epic

During the Upkeep Phase, if you control 3 or more outposts, place a Domination token on Altar of Domination. During the Deployment Phase, if there are 4 or more Domination tokens on Altar, you may retrieve Talos from your spellbook and Summon it to this zone at no mana cost. Then destroy Altar.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: What is that creaking? The statue! Talos comes to Life!

card.name: Altar of Infernia
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic
All creatures lose, and cannot gain, Melee +X traits. This does not affect Melee -X traits.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: As Grimmbor rushed forward to grab the Grimoire from the idol-strewn altar, he felt his strength ebb away.

card.name: Altar of Peace
card.property: Zone Exclusive Unique

Once per round when you have priority, you may give a target Living creature one of the following until the end of the round: The Aegis +1 Trait, +1 to Defense rolls, or the Tough -2 Trait. If the target is a Minor creature, it receives all three options until the end of the round. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

card.name: Altar of Skulls
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic Necromancer Only

Whenever an enemy Corporeal creature is destroyed, place a Skull token on Altar. Once per round, as a full action, a friendly cleric creature in Altar's zone may place a Skull token on Altar. While Altar has 8 or more Skull tokens, it gains Lifebond +2, all Living creatures gain Finite Life, and during the Upkeep Phase each Living creature receives 2 direct poison damage.

card.name: Altar of the Iron Guard
card.property: Zone Exclusive Legendary
Whenever a creature comes into play, which you control, you may place a Guard marker on it.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: You must first be a shield, before you can be a sword.

card.name: Animal Kinship
card.property: Zone Exclusive Beastmaster Only
As long as you control any of these animal creatures, your Mage gains these traits and abilities: Canine = Melee +1, Reptile = Armor +1, Bear = Tough -2, Ape = Climbing, Cat = Elusive.

card.name: Archer's Watchtower
card.property: Zone Exclusive Flame +2

May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Once per round, when a friendly soldier in this zone declares a ranged attack, Archer's Watchtower may give that soldier the Ranged +1 and Indirect traits for that attack. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

card.name: Armory
card.property: Zone Exclusive Flame +2 Unique

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Everything you need under one, reinforced roof.

card.property: Giant Bolt Ranged 1-2 | 5d6 | Piercing +3
Zone Exclusive Flame +2 Unique War Mage Only
Ballista starts with 1 Load token on it. Each Upkeep Phase place 1 Load token on it, to a maximum of 2. Before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may remove 2 tokens to make its attack.

card.name: Barracks
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Flame +2 Epic Warlord Only

May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. X = the number of outposts you control, with a maximum value of 3. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Barracks, it may summon 1 soldier creature.

card.name: Battle Forge
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Flame Immunity Hydro +3

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The forge of Eisenach tempers the wary and smelts their courage upon the anvil of war." Hojn of the Harshforge

Bed of Urchins attacks each non-Flying creature immediately after they enter the zone. Aquatic creatures are immune to the Venomous Spines attack if there is an aquatic terrain attached to this zone.

card.name: Consecrated Ground
card.property: During the Upkeep Phase, non-Holy enemy creatures in this zone receive 1 direct light damage. Friendly Holy creatures in this zone gain the Regenerate 1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Brynth quietly prayed and struck the cobblestones with her staff. Golden fog rose from the stone as a holy nimbus transformed the land itself into Celestia.

card.name: Construction Yard
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic

May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Whenever a Nonliving Corporeal conjuration is destroyed, place an amount of mana equal to its Level on Construction Yard. Once per round, if you, or a friendly Spawnpoint or Familiar, casts a Corporeal War conjuration or an Earth wall, you may use any mana on Construction Yard to pay towards the casting cost for that spell.

card.name: Corrosive Orchid
card.property: Living Flame +2 Hydro Immunity

Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Orchid's attack targets a Mage, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token, choose an equipment object on that Mage, and pay its casting cost to destroy that object.

card.name: Crusade Banner
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Epic Paladin Only
Non-flame ranged attacks roll 2 less dice (to a minimum of 1) against Crusade Banner. During the Deployment Phase, it may summon exactly 2 Holy creatures. If it does, destroy Crusade Banner.

card.name: Deathlock
card.property: Zeon Exclusive Epic
All creatures and conjurations gain the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The other demons cowered and hid the day Abaddon forged Deathlock."

card.name: Dojo
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Epic Monk Only
During the Deployment Phase, Dojo may cast 1 Monk or Martial Creature, Enchantment, or Equipment spell.

card.name: Elephant Grass
card.property: Hydro Immunity Flame +2

Other non-Flying objects in this zone gain the Obscured trait. Attacks against non-Flying animal creatures in this zone roll 2 less attack dice. Non-Flying, non-animal creatures in this zone are hindered.

card.name: Enchanter's Wardstone
card.property: Zone Exclusive Flame Immunity
When an enchantment you control would be destroyed by a spell or ability an opponent controls, prevent that destruction unless that opponent pays 2 mana.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Johktari trickery! It will require more power to unseat them.

card.name: Etherian Lifetree
card.property: Zone Exclusive Regenerate 2 Unique Flame +2 Hydro Immunity Living
All other Living creatures and conjurations gain Innate Life +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Nature is simple. Life is meant to be shared, and meant to flourish.

card.name: Frozen Tundra
card.property: Non-frost objects in this zone gain the Frost +1 trait. All Corporeal non-frost creatures require a full action to move out of this zone. During the Upkeep Phase, each object in this zone takes direct damage equal to the number of Freeze conditions on it. All objects in this or adjacent zones lose the Melting X trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Those who venture the tundra learn that their screams are captured by the ice."

card.name: Galaxxus
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic
Each Upkeep Phase you gain one V'tar. When cast, it must be placed in a zone without a V'Tar Orb, and that zone must be adjacent to a zone with a V'Tar Orb you control.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Using all of our knowledge and greatest forge, we created our own version of the V'Tar Orb." - Gorton, Orc Inventor

card.name: Garrison Post
card.property: Zone Exclusive Flame +2

May not be placed in a zone adjacent to another friendly outpost. Whenever your Mage, or a War spawnpoint he controls, summons a friendly soldier creature, you may choose to summon it to Garrison Post's zone, regardless of range or LoS.

card.name: Gate to Hell
card.property: Open the Gate Flame | 4d6 | d12 5-10 = Burn, 11+ = 2 Burn | Unavoidable, Defrost
Zone Exclusive Flame Immunity Hydro 3 Epic Warlock Only

All demon creatures gain Melee +1. Gate to Hell enters play with a "Closed" token. Once per game, as a full action, you may pay 12 mana to flip the token to the "Opened" side, and make the above attack against each non-flying creature in the arena. Once opened, whenever you, or a spawnpoint or familiar you control, Summon a demon creature, you may place it in the Gate's zone.

card.name: Gate to Voltari
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Epic Wizard Only

When Gate to Voltari comes into play, choose an opponent Mage. Whenever that Mage casts and resolves a spell, place 1 mana on Gate. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 3 or more mana on Gate, it may summon one Corporeal Arcane creature.

card.name: Graveyard
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Lightning Immunity Burnproof Epic Necromancer Only
During the Deployment Phase, Graveyard may summon one Dark Nonliving creature. The first time each round that a creature is destroyed, you may place mana equal to its Level on Graveyard.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: You see a solemn place of reverence. I see a playground.

card.name: Gravikor
card.property: Zone Exclusive Legendary Epic
All creatures within 2 zones of Gravikor lose, and cannot gain, the Flying trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Flight is a matter of will, and will can be subdued." - Lydia Corbain, Forcemaster

card.name: Hand of Bim-Shalla
card.property: Zone Exclusive Unique

Once each round, before or after any friendly creature's Action Phase, you may give a Living creature Armor +1 or the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round, or you may heal 1 damage from it. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

card.name: Harshforge Monolith
card.property: Zone Exclusive Burnproof Legendary Epic
All enchantments (hidden and revealed), within 1 zone of Harshforge Monolith, gain the Upkeep +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Mages around Etheria were both fascinated and wary of the discovery of Harshforge metal. The Arraxian Crown took action to gain this resource themselves.

card.name: Hidden Tunnels
card.property: Target object Hidden Tunnels is attached to gains Innate Life +3. Friendly soldier creatures may use a single move action to move up to 2 zones, to or from this zone and another zone with a friendly outpost in it. They move directly to the other zone, ignoring intervening walls and zones. Hidden Tunnels does not count as an Outpost for determining adjacency.

card.name: Idol of Pestilence
card.property: Zone Exclusive Legendary Epic
During the Upkeep Phase, each Living creature receives 1 point of direct poison damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Malacoda's wrath is so terrible, that even the very land itself is damaged by a mere representation of his power."

card.name: Lair
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Epic Beastmaster Only
During the Deployment Phase, Lair may summon 1 animal creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "This looks like a safe place to camp." Last Words of Struneth, the Sleeper

card.name: Malakai's Basilica
card.property: Zone Exclusive Unique
During the Upkeep Phase, target enemy creature gains the Light +1 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The Flame of Righteousness burns and purifies." Inscription on Malakai's Basilica

card.name: Mana Crystal
card.property: Zone Exclusive Flame Immunity
Controller gains Channeling +1.

card.name: Mana Flower
card.property: Zone Exclusive Regenerate 2 Living Flame +2 Hydro Immunity
Controller gains Channeling +1.

card.name: Mana Prism
card.property: Zone Exclusive Burnproof Unique

Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to lose or pay mana, including upkeep costs and Mana Drain/Transfer effects, place that mana on Mana Prism instead. If the mana was being transferred to be their supply, cancel that transfer. During the Channel Phase you may remove 2 mana from Mana Prism and place it in your supply.

card.name: Mana Siphon
card.property: Zone Exclusive Incorporeal Epic

When Mana Siphon comes into play, choose a Mage up to 2 zones away and within LoS of this spell. That Mage gains Channeling -2 as long as Mana Siphon remains in play, and regardless of where the chosen Mage is in the arena.

card.name: Mangler Caltrops
card.property: Wicked Spikes 2d6 | Unavoidable, Piercing +1
Mangler Caltrops attacks each non-Flying creature immediately after it enters the zone. Mangler Caltrops hinders non-Flying creatures. Ranged attacks cannot target Caltrops.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Wait! Don't go in there fool! You'll be lame for life!

card.name: Meredia's Blessing
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic

During each Upkeep Phase, if one Mage controls more Living non-token objects than any other Mage, that Mage may heal a non-Mage Living ibject up to 2 points of damage. The same Mage may also remove 1 condition marker from a non-Mage Living object by paying its removal cost.

card.name: Mind's Eye
card.property: Incorporeal Flying Mind Mage Only

Once per round, if your Mage or a Familiar you control casts a quick spell, during the Cast Spell Step you may choose to have that spell originate from Mind's Eye, which becomes the source of the spell. During the Upkeep Phase, you may move Mind's Eye to an adjacent zone.

card.name: Mohktari, Great Tree of Life
card.property: Regenerate 2 Living Legendary Flame +2 Hydro Immunity
All friendly Living creatures in Mohktari's zone gain the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "They say the roots are ten times thicker than a man. And the life they give? A hundred time longer." Beastmaster Andros Klark

card.name: Mordok's Obelisk
card.property: Zone Exclusive Legendary Epic
All non-Mage creatures gain the Upkeep +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The archmage Mordok believed that duels should be decided by the skills of the mage, not the number of his minions."

card.name: Natural Pandemonium
card.property: Zone Exclusive Epic Elementalist Only

You may discount an elemental, golem, or sprite's casting cost equal to the amount of zones adjacent to Natural Pandemonium to a minimum of 1 casting cost. If you do, you must place that creature in Natural Pandemonium's zone. When an elemental, golem, or sprite creature you control is destroyed, you may destroy Natural Pandemonium to Reanimate it.

card.name: Nightshade Lotus
card.property: Poison Sleep Mist Ranged 0-0 | Poison | 3d6 | Unavoidable
Living Flame +2 Hydro Immunity

Comes into play with a Mist token on it. When Lotus's attack targets a Living non-Mage creature, at the end of the Damage & Effects Step, you may remove the Mist token and pay mana equal to that creature's Level +2 to place a Sleep condition marker on that creature.

card.name: Pentagram
card.property: Spawnpoint Zone Exclusive Incorporeal Epic Warlock Only

Each time a different enemy creature is attacked and damaged by a friendly creature, place 1 mana on Pentagram. Pentagram may gain a maximum of 2 mana per round this way. During the Deployment Phase, if there is 2 or more mana on Pentagram, it may summon 1 Dark Living creature.

card.name: Pillar of Righteous Flame

Dissipate 4 Epic

When a Dissipate token is removed, Pillar of Righteous Flame makes an attack against an enemy creature in its zone. When Pillar of Righteous Flame is cast, remove a Dissipate token. Whenever an enemy creature enters this zone, you may remove a Dissipate token to attack that creature.

card.name: Poison Gas Cloud
card.property: Incorporeal Wind +2

card.name: Quicksand
card.property: Indestructible

Target creature is Restrained, and gains the Unmovable trait. At the end of each of its Action Phases, place a Sink token on Quicksand. When there are 4 Sink token on Quicksand, destroy it and the creature. As a quick action, creature may roll 1d12 to escape, subtracting 1 for each Sink token. On an 8+ destroy Quicksand. X = the creature's Level. Quicksand cannot target creatures with the Uncontainable trait.

card.name: Raincloud
card.property: Incorporeal Flying Hydro Immunity

All objects in Raincloud's zone gain the Flame -2, Acid -2, and Regenerate 1 traits. Each Upkeep Phase you may remove 1 Burn or Corrode condition from 1 object in Raincloud's zone, by paying its removal cost. Once per round, immediately before or after any friendly Action Phase, you may pay 1 mana to move Raincloud 1 zone and attach it to that zone.

card.property: Zone Exclusive

card.name: Renewing Spring

card.name: Harmonize
card.property: Magebind +2
Harmonize can only target an object that has the Channeling attribute. This object gains Channeling +1.

card.name: Hawkeye
card.property: This creature gains the Ranged +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I grant you perfect vision. Use it as the hawk seeks the tiny mouse from the high in the sky." Rajan, Lord of the Beasts

card.name: Healing Charm
card.property: When Healing Charm is revealed, this creature heals the amount rolled on 4 attack dice. Then, destroy Healing Charm.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Boons from Asyra appear when least expected.

card.name: Healing Madrigal
card.property: Dissipate 3
During the Upkeep Phase, heal all friendly living creatures in this zone 2 damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The words of Bim-Shalla are the living song of life.

card.name: Hellfire Trap
card.property: Hellfire Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Hellfire Trap. Hellfire Trap immediately attacks that creature. Then, destroy Hellfire Trap.

card.name: Horse Stance
card.property: Monk Only Stance

This creature gain the Aegis 1 trait. Resilience - When this Monk is attacked, during the Avoid Attack Step you may spend 2 Ki. If you do, this creature gains the Tough -2 trait until the end of the attack. Strike Through - When this Monk is using a melee attack, during the Avoid Attack Step you may pay 2 Ki to add the Piercing +2 trait until the end of the attack.

card.name: Hydrothermal Vent
card.property: When an enemy creature enters this zone, Hydrothermal Vent must be revealed. Make the above attack, then destroy Hydrothermal Vent. The reveal cost is lowered by 1 if enchanting a zone with an aquatic terrain attached.

card.name: Jinx
card.property: When this creature casts a quick spell, you must reveal Jinx during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is canceled and is returned to its owner's spellbook. Any mana spent to cast that spell is refunded to the caster's mana supply. Then, destroy Jinx.

card.name: Knight's Courage
card.property: While attacking the strongest enemy creature, this creature gains Melee +2 and its attacks gain Piercing +1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Strength and honor a Knight is sustained on these alone." Brogan Bloodstone

card.name: Levitation
card.property: When this creature is activated, you may pay 1 mana to give it the Flying trait until the end of its Action Phase.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Everyone is scared on their first landing."

card.name: Life Link
card.property: Magecast Unique Holy Mage Only
Each Upkeep Phase, the controller of Life Link may heal up to 3 damage from this creature and place it on himself as direct damage, regardless of distance of LoS.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: United in focus, spirit, and life.

card.name: Lion Savagery
card.property: This creature gains the Charge +2 trait. Its melee attacks gain the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Fight like the lion, from the spirit and heart. Courage begets strength." - Jhambai, Johktari Medicine Man

card.name: Lullaby
card.property: Dissipate 2
During the Upkeep Phase, roll the effect die. On a 7+ this creature gains a Stun Condition, otherwise it gains a Daze Condition.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Listen to the melody of Val'as Sheran, Landwalker, for it is a song peace and rest." Wei'vanna, Siren of Shaolsdeep

card.name: Magebane
card.property: Each time this creature casts and resolves a spell, it receives 1 direct damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "If your spells cause you such pain, then perhaps take up another pursuit. We can always use more farmers." Laddinfance, Primus of the White Spires

card.name: Maim Wings
card.property: This creature loses the Flying trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Flight is considered an advantage, until one finds oneself unable to stay aloft." Dark Tactics: A Treatise on Mage Wars Strategies

card.name: Mana Vampirism
card.property: Magebind +1
This creature's melee attacks gain the Mana Transfer +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The best source of mana is from your opponent." - Skylar, Wizard

card.name: Marked for Death
card.property: Magebind +2
All creatures gain +1 attack die when attacking this creature. Creatures can only gain this bonus for the first attack they make each round against this creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "There is nowhere to run, once you have been marked..." last words of Jervan, Paladin of Asyra

card.name: Mind Control
card.property: Upkeep +X Mind Mage Only

You control this creature. Mind Control can only be revealed between Action Phases, and the controller must be within 1 zone of Mind Control. When Mind Control is revealed or removed, place Stun condition on this creature. X = Target creature's Level. Mind Control cannot be moved to a new target. During the Upkeep Phase, Mind Control's upkeep cost must be paid before any other upkeep costs on this creature.

card.name: Mind Shield
card.property: Mind Shield may be revealed during the Counter Spell or Avoid Attack Steps to counter a psychic spell or cancel a psychic attack, respectively. If a psychic enchantment is revealed on this creature, you may immediately reveal Mind Shield; Cancel and destroy that enchantment before its reveal costs are paid. Then, destroy Mind Shield.

card.name: Mongoose Agility
card.property: This creature gains the Elusive trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Embrace their artful movement. What sentry could ever hope to block a darting mongoose?!"

card.name: Nullify
card.property: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Nullify during the Counter Spell Step. That spell is countered. Then, destroy Nullify.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "A simple charm to devour magic, but it only has appetite for one."

card.name: Pacify
card.property: Each round, the first time this creature makes a melee or ranged attack, its controller must pay 2 mana during the Declare Attack Step, or else the attack the attack is cancelled. Pacify does not affect counterstrikes.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Soothe your hateful heart, fearful beast of my being! The light of peace lives within you too."

card.name: Plagued
card.property: Magebind +2
Each Upkeep Phase, place a point of direct poison damage on each Living creature in this zone (including this creature).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "So much death, the very smell of it clogs my nostril." Mikal Mckay, Beastmaster

card.name: Poisoned Blood
card.property: This creature gains the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Do you feel your life's blood turning to poison, ravaging you? Perhaps if you are quick, you may drain enough of it to live? No, perhaps not." Tellas Vane, Warlock

card.name: Regrowth
card.property: Magebind +1
This creature gains the Regenerate 2 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: I've seen clean skin where there once was destroyed flesh. It's... unnatural."

card.name: Retaliate
card.property: This creature's quick action melee attacks gain the Counterstrike trait. The first time it makes a Counterstrike attack, destroy Retaliate.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "As the monster follows through its swing, stab it right in the back before it has the chance to recover. Lord Bellicar, the Superlative Startegist"

card.name: Reverse Attack
card.property: When this creature is attacked, you must reveal Reverse Attack during the Avoid Attack Step. The attack is avoided and then redirected back to the attacker, who now becomes the target of that attack for the next, 2 steps (Roll Dice and Damage and Effects). Then, destroy Reverse Attack. If the attack is Unavoidable, destroy Reverse Attack without effect.

card.name: Reverse Magic
card.property: When this creature is targeted by an incantation or enchantment spell controlled by an opponent, you must reveal Reverse Magic during the Counter Spell Step. Redirect it back to the caster, who now becomes the target of the spell. You control that spell, and may make new choices, paying additional mana costs if any. Then, destroy Reverse Magic.

card.name: Rhino Hide
card.property: Magebind +1
This creature gains Armor +2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Armor is not an invention of men. It is the natural embodiment of dominance." Rajan, Lord of the Beasts

card.name: Rise Again
card.property: Dark Mage Only

When this creature is destroyed, you may pay hald its casting cost (rounded up) to Reanimate it. When the creature comes into play, place a Zombie condition marker on it, and place damage on it equal to its Level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You are not finished yet, my friend. I have one last task fo you." - Saldam Kurr, Necromancer Magister

card.name: Rust
card.property: Magebind +1
This creature gains Armor -2.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: There is nothing you can build that nature cannot reclaim.

card.name: Sacred Ground
card.property: All friendly Living creatures in this zone gain the Aegis 1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Here is where the mortal-bound touch the plane of angels to dance the eternal dance against darkness." Samandriel, Angel of Light

card.name: Sentinel of V'Tar
card.property: While in the same zone as a V'Tar Orb you control, this creature has the Unmovable and Anchored traits and gains Armor +2 and the Melee +1 trait while guarding.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The simplest beast of Kumanjaro can be transformed into the greatest of defenders.

card.name: Song of Love
card.property: Dissipate 2 Unique

Song of Love cannot be revealed during an Action Phase. When Song of Love is revealed, place a Love token on a friendly creature. Enchanted creature cannot make a melee or ranged attack against a creature with a Love token. When this spell is destroyed, destroy a Love token in play on a friendly creature, if possible. X = enchanted creature's Level -1.

card.name: Spiked Pit
card.property: Spiked Pit can only target a zone with no enemy non-Flying creatures. When an enemy non-Flying creature enters the zone, you must reveal Spiked Pit. Spike Pit immediately attacks that creature. Then, destroy Spiked Pit.

card.name: Standard Bearer
card.property: Cantrip Unique Warlord Only
All other friendly creatures in the same zone gain Melee +1 and Armor +1.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You are chosen. This banner is our victory. Should it touch the ground you will pay with your life, or those who've slain you will." - Gurmash, Orc Warlord

card.name: Stumble
card.property: When this creature is activated, you may reveal Stumble. If you do, this creature can't take move actions until the end of its Action Phase. Then, destroy Stumble. Has no effect on creatures with the Unmovable or Uncontainable trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Useful in combat, and also good for winning the occasional wager against those who think with their muscles.

card.name: Summoning Circle
card.property: Whenever your Mage summons a friendly creature, they may choose to summon it to Summoning Circle's zone instead of their own zone, regardless of range or LoS.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Magic is about finding doors where there are none, and paths where there is obstrcution. No Mage rose to power saying 'My reach is too short.'" Amadseer the Cursed, Wizard of Sortilege

card.name: Teleport Trap
card.property: Teleport Trap can only target a zone without enemy creatures. When an enemy creature enters the zone, you must reveal Teleport Trap. That creature is immediately teleported to a zone of your choice, up to 2 zones away. Then, destroy Teleport Trap.

card.name: Temporal Aid
card.property: The Quick Action Symbol is now taken as a Full Action on this creature. The Full Actions Symbol is now a taken as a Quick Action on this creature. X = Level of Creature. This does not apply to movement actions.

card.name: Tiger Stance
card.property: Monk Only Stance

Hidden Hunter - This Monk gains Reach, Charge +1, and +1 vs Flying traits. Parry - When this Monk is melee attacked, during the Avoid Attack Step you may spend 2 Ki. If you do, this creature gains a 7+ Defense for that attack.

card.name: Turn to Stone
card.property: Upkeep +4
This creature is Incapacitated, and gains Armor +6. You cannot reveal Turn to Stone during an action, such as an attack or spell.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Your Hydra will make a wonderful addition to my sculpture garden." Rolnas Tugany

card.name: V'Tar Force Sentry
card.property: Once per round, before or after a friendly creature's Action Phase, you may Push a target enemy creature within 1 zone, 1 zone away. Cannot Push a creature through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait. Use a ready marker to keep track of this ability.

card.name: Vampirism
card.property: This creature's melee attacks gain the Vampiric trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "My master has given me power, and my fangs shall drink of your blood and give me life." An unnamed Blood Demon in the heat of battle

card.name: Akiro's Battle Cry
card.property: Epic Warlord Only
All friendly soldier creatures in the arena gain the Fast and Charge +2 traits, until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Victory is not enough! Conquer them, break them! Tonight we write history in blood!" - Trokoth of the Blood Wave

card.name: Animate Dead
card.property: Dark Mage Only

Choose a non-Epic Living creature from any discard pile, and Summon it into your zone. Place damage on that creature equal to its Level. Place a Zombie marker on that creature. X = half the creature's casting cost (rounded up).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Come, forgotten one. I am your master now!" - Shlaka, Blight of Darkfenne

card.name: Banish
card.property: Teleport target creature out of the arena. Place 3 Banish tokens on it. Remove 1 Banish token each Upkeep Phase. When the final token is removed, return the creature to the last zone it was in. While out of the arena, this creature cannot take any action, its action marker remains unchanged, and it can only be affected by attached spells, conditions, or its own traits and abilities.

card.name: Battle Fury
card.property: The next time this round the target creature makes a non-counterstrike melee attack, at the end of that attack action it may immediately make a quick action melee attack. This extra attack counts as part of the same attack action. Only one Battle Fury spell may be cast per round on the same creature.

card.name: Bloodthirsty Strike
card.property: Novice
Target gains the Bloodthirsty +2 trait until the end of the round. Target's next melee attack this round gains the Piercing +1 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "His heartbeat was driving me insane, so I just ripped it out."

card.name: Burst of Thorns
card.property: Druid Only
Target friendly vine marker makes the above attack. Then, destroy that vine marker.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Druids do not look kindly on those who trample their gardens." - Guide to Wychwood

card.name: Call of the Wild
card.property: All friendly animal creatures in the arena gain the Melee +1 trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "A vicious howling heralds the coming wave of a thousand gnashing teeth."

card.name: Cascading Force Wave
card.property: Target creature is Pushed one zone in the direction of your choice. If that creature is Pushed to a new zone, you may pay 3 mana to Push a different creature in that zone, one zone in any direction, and repeat this process. A creature cannot be affected by Cascading Force Wave more than once in the same casting. Creatures cannot be Pushed through walls with the Passage Attacks trait.

card.name: Charge
card.property: Target gains the Fast and Charge +1 traits until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Stand your ground men! These beasts are driven by unnatural fury!"

card.name: Clear Mind
card.property: Remove as many psychic, Daze, or Stun conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed psychic enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

card.name: Combustion
card.property: Remove all Burn conditions from the target. Then, Combustion makes the above attack to the target where X is twice the number of Burn conditions removed.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "This is taking too long. Let's accelerate the situation!" - Krastar, Warlock

card.name: Conquer
card.property: Magecast War Mage Only

Target must not be attached to another object. If you control the target's zone, and have a friendly soldier in that zone, destroy the target. Then, as a free action, you may immediately cast the destroyed conjuration, or a non-Terrain conjuration spell from your spellbook, targeting this zone. X = the casting cost of the target.

card.name: Defend
card.property: Novice
Place a Guard marker on target, if it does not already have a Guard marker. X depends on the creature's Level: Level 1-2 = 1 Level 3-4 = 2 Level 5+ = 3

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Always watchful, always ready. - Third Ivarian Legion

card.name: Destroy Magic
card.property: Destroy all enchantments in target zone (both revealed and hidden), regardless of what they are attached to.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "First, I'll strip away your precious enchantments. Then, you'll face my wrath!" Zhul the Black

card.name: Disarm
card.property: Novice
When you cast Disarm, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. Place a Disabled marker on it. X = the object's Level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A weapon is only as powerful as your grasp of it.

card.name: Dispel
card.property: Destroy target revealed enchantment. X = total mana cost of target enchantment (casting plus reveal cost).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "So much effort. So little effect." Anonymous

card.name: Dissolve
card.property: When you cast Dissolve, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. Destroy the chosen equipment. X = equipment's casting cost.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The look on a goblin's face when it realizes it has to find something else to stab you with is priceless." Laddinfance, Primus of the White Spires

card.name: Drain Life
card.property: Magecast Dark Mage Only
The target receives 5 attack dice of direct damage. The caster also heals damage equal to the damage received by the target creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Ah, the vital energies of living creatures, how I hunger for their sweet taste." Malacoda, Demon Prince of Pain

card.name: Drain Power
card.property: Magecast
Roll 8 attack dice. The target loses that much mana from his mana supply. The caster gains mana equal to the mana lost.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The mana knew where it would be better used. It is not my fault you were found wanting." Laddinfance, Primus of the White Spires

card.name: Drain Soul
card.property: Magecast Dark Mage Only
Place 2 Tainted condition markers on target creature. Then, caster gains Life +6.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The Johktari claim that the first recorded use of this spell is a crypt in the plains of Kartak, full of desiccated corpses.

card.name: Earthquake
card.property: Target up to 2 adjacent zones, as long as at least one zone is in range and LoS. All Corporeal conjurations in target zones, including a wall between the two zones, receive an Unavoidable attack of 4 attack dice. Roll the effect die for each creture in the zones; on a 5+ it receives the Slam condition. Earthquake has no effect on Flying, Incorporeal, or Unmovable creatures.

card.name: Evade
card.property: Target gains the Elusive trait until the end of the round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Not this time!"

card.name: Explode
card.property: Fiery Blast Quick | Flame | 4d6 | d12 6+ = Burn | Unavoidable, Defrost

When you cast Explode, choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. X = 6 + the equipment's casting cost. Destroy the chosen equipment. Then, Explode makes the above flame attack against the target Mage.

card.name: Flame Strike
card.property: Target may make a quick non-spell melee attack. That attack loses all damage types and effects. It gains the flame damage type, an effect die roll, and the Defrost trait. This cannot gain the effect of the Melee +X or Bloodthirsty +X traits.

card.name: Flank Attack
card.property: If target's next melee attack this round attacks an enemy creature, that was attacked and damaged by another friendly soldier this round, then the attack gains the Piercing +2 trait, and target gains the Melee +2 trait for the attack.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Two soldiers working together is always better than three working apart." - Bloodwave Strategist

card.name: Force Bash
card.property: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. This will not Push it through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay an additional 3 mana when this spell is cast. If the Push moved the target, give it the Slam condition, and you may choose a secondary target creature in that zone and also give it the Slam condition.

card.name: Force Push
card.property: Target creature is Pushed 1 zone in the direction of your choice. This will not Push it through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay an additional 3 mana when this spell is cast.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The fury of a demon is no match for the force of my mind." - Lydia Corbain, Forcemaster

card.name: Force Wave
card.property: All creatures in target zone are Pushed 1 zone away in the same direction. This will not Push them through a wall with the Passage Attacks trait, unless you pay an additional 6 mana when this spell is cast.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Away from me, feeble-minded fiends!" - Ursbay the Astute

card.name: Group Heal
card.property: Heal each friendly Living creture in the target zone the amount rolled on 5 attack dice. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Bring forth your wounded faithful that they may drink of the Light of Asyra. - Asyran Prayer

card.name: Heal
card.property: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 8 attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Westlock is a frail nation, but their faith is strong. With it, they have saved those I have sent to death's door." - Trokoth, of the Blood Wave

card.name: Holy Strike
card.property: Target may make a quick non-spell melee attack. That attack loses all damage types and effects. It gains the light damage type, an effect die roll, and the Ethereal trait. This cannot gain the effect of the Melee +X or Bloodthirsty +X traits.

card.name: Ignite
card.property: If target does not already have a Burn condition, it receives a Burn conditon.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Do not attempt to control fire; just start it and let the rest happen on it's own." - Infernicus, Warlock

card.name: Knockdown
card.property: Target is Incapacitated until the beginning of its next Action Phase, or until the end of the round, whichever comes first. Knockdown has no effect on Unmovable creatures.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Are you a harlot or a hero? Get up!" Kemsaal the Sleight

card.name: Lay Hands
card.property: Epic Holy Mage Only
Heal target creature the amount rolled on 12 attack dice. Remove as many condition markers as you wish from target creature by paying their removal costs.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Still yourself. Bim-Shalla's caress will lift the pain."

card.name: Lesser Teleport
card.property: Novice
Target creature, without attached conjurations, is Teleported to a target a zone up to 1 zone away from its current zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I can't be everywhere at once, but I intend to be everywhere that matters." Trokoth

card.name: Lightning Strike
card.property: Target may make a quick non-spell melee attack. That attack loses all damage types and effects. It gains the lightning damage type, an effect die roll, and the Ethereal trait. This cannot gain the effect of the Melee +X or Bloodthirsty +X traits.

card.name: Martyr's Restoration
card.property: Holy Mage Only
Remove up to 5 damage from target creature and place it on the caster of this spell. This effect bypasses the Finite Life trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Fear not the sting of arrows or spears we shall taste victory together, advancing as one." Cassius Lionheart, Paladin of Ivarium

card.name: Mass Sleep
card.property: Place a Sleep condition marker on each non-Mage Living creature in target zone.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Don't try to shake them awake, it's a deep magical sleep. Here, use this hammer and strike hard!"

card.name: Meltdown
card.property: Target Mage may immediately destroy or keep any number of equipment attached to them. They lose 1 life for each equipment chosen to be kept.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "A mage is not his armor or sword, a mage is his wit. Some need to be reminded, painfully reminded."

card.name: Mending Wave
card.property: Target creature heals the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature within 1 zone of the first creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Then, heal target creature within 1 zone of the second creature the amount rolled on 3 attack dice. Mending Wave can't target the same creature twice.

card.name: Minor Heal
card.property: Heal target creature the amount rolled on 5 attack dice.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Tis just a scatch / Shed not a tear! / Wicked fiends be about / It is they that should fear!" Motto of the Holy Watchmen

card.name: Overextend
card.property: Overextend can only target an inactive creature. Flip the creature's action marker face-up. After that creature's next activation, it gains a Stun condition. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A warrior learns his limits, so he knows how far to push them.

card.name: Perfect Strike
card.property: Novice
Target's next melee attack this round gains the Unavoidable trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Funny how your face found my sword, isn't it?" Brogan Bloodstone

card.name: Piercing Strike
card.property: Novice
Target's next melee attack this round gains the Piercing +3 trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Strike true! Strike deep! Strike victorious!" Akiro

card.name: Power Strike
card.property: Novice
Target gains the Melee +2 trait for its next melee attack this round.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You are only finished when your weapon comes out the other side!" - Trokoth of the Blood Wave

card.name: Purge Magic
card.property: Destroy all enchantments attached to target object (both hidden and revealed).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "It is a tenuous knot that holds a spell together. All you have to do is tug at the strings."

card.name: Purify
card.property: Remove as many poison conditions as you wish from the target, paying the removal cost for each one. Then, destroy as many revealed poison enchantments from the target as you wish, paying the total mana cost (casting and reveal cost) for each one.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Dark blood shall never befoul my servants." Asyra

card.name: Reassemble
card.property: Roll 6 dice. Target skeleton object may Reconstruct up to that much damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Skeletons are usually not as tough as zombies, but easier to put back together. Smell isn't as bad either.

card.name: Renewing Rain
card.property: Remove all Burn conditions from all objects. All friendly Living objects may heal up to 2 damage.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "How else does one water a garden this size?" - Shalla of the Ancient Oaks

card.name: Repulse
card.property: All creatures in target zone, except the caster, are Pushed 1 zone away in a random direction. Roll separately for each creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The orcs surrounded Lydia, axes readied. She smiled, and with a wave of her hand, she was alone again.

card.name: Resurrection
card.property: Choose a destroyed Living creature from your discard pile and summon it to the caster's zone. X = target spell's mana cost plus its spell Level.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Rise! Your sacrifice is not forgotten!" Bim-Shalla, the Soothing Blam

card.name: Rouse the Beast
card.property: Target a creature simmoned this round. Flip target creature's action marker to the active side. That creature may act normally this round. You can only cast this one time per round on the same creature. X = target's Level.

card.name: Seeking Dispel
card.property: Destroy target hidden enchantment. Controller of target enchantment cannot reveal the enchantment once Seeking Dispel has been cast.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "But my enchantment had such potential!" - White Spire Student

card.name: Shift Enchantment
card.property: Novice

Move target enchantment you control to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range an LoS. X = 1 if the enchantment is hidden, or the Level of the enchantment if it is revealed.

card.name: Sleep
card.property: Target falls asleep. Place a Sleep condition marker on it. Does not affect creatures with Psychic Immunity. Lookup value of X below: Level 1 = 4 mana Level 2 = 5 mana Level 3 = 6 mana Add 2 mana to the cost for each Level beyond 3.

card.name: Smite
card.property: Magecast Epic Paladin Only
As an additional cost to cast Smite, you must pay 4 Valor. Your next melee attack this round, deals critical damage, gains the Unavoidable trait, and rolls 2 additional attack dice.

card.name: Sniper Shot
card.property: Target's next ranged attack this round, gains the Unavoidable and Piercing +1 traits. This spell has no effect no zone attacks. If the attack targets more than one object, this spell only affects an attack against the first target.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Do not nock an arrow unless you intent to kill with it." - Trokoth of the Blood Wave

card.name: Steal Enchantment
card.property: Move target revealed enchantment to a new legal target. Both the enchantment and the new target must be within range and LoS. You now control that enchantment. X = the casting & reveal cost of target enchantment, plus you pay the casting & reveal cost of attaching it to the new target (as if you just cast and revealed the spell).

card.name: Steal Equipment
card.property: Magecast

Choose an equipment object attached to target Mage. You control that equipment. You may immediately destroy it; Or, if you can legally attach it to yourself, you may do so, returning any item in that location slot to your spellbook. X = the chosen equipment's casting cost.

card.name: Teleport
card.property: Target creature is Teleported to the target zone. X = 3 mana per zone moved away from its current zone. You must pay at least 3 mana even if target is teleported into the same zone. This does not count as a move action for the creature.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Teleportation is as simple as folding a piece of paper for those whose canvas is the fabric of space.

card.name: Unholy Resurgence
card.property: Epic
Each frienly skeleton object in the arena rolls 6 attack dice and may Reconstruct up to that much damage (roll serparately for each object).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Don't get too caught up on which bones went with which so long as they all fit back together somehow.

card.name: V'Tar Suppression
card.property: Epic
During the next Upkeep Phase, V'Tar Orbs do not function (they do not generate V'Tar, and they do not provide mana or healing).

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Master ancient secrets and you control the flow of V'Tar.

card.name: V'Tarrian Healing Song
card.property: Target must be in a zone with a V'Tar Orb you control. Heal target creature the amount rolled on 2 attack dice, and add an additional 2 attack dice to this roll for each V'Tar Orb you control.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Hear this song of the spheres and your wounds will heal.

card.name: Vampiric Strike
card.property: Target's next melee attack this round gains the Vampiric and Piercing +1 traits.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Nothing is quite as addictive as another's life." Krimsen, Dark Mage of the Cloud

card.name: Weapon Strike
card.property: Magecast

You may only cast this spell once per round. Target Mage makes a quick non-spell melee attack using an equipment object in their weapon location. Then, target Mage makes another quick non-spell melee attack using an equipment object in their shield location. These attacks cannot benefit from the Melee + Trait.

card.name: Whirling Strike
card.property: Once this round, if this creature uses a full action to make a quick action melee attack, it may use that attack against up to 3 different target objects in its zone. It attacks each target, one after the other, in the same manner as the Sweeping trait.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A difficult technique to master, but necessary if surrounded.

card.name: Zombie Frenzy
card.property: Until the end of the round, all zombie creatures in the arena lose the Lumbering, Slow, and Pest traits, and gain the Fast and Bloodthirsty +1 traits.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "I know only the smell of the corpses and the sound of the screams, as I had not the courage to watch the onslaught."

card.name: Acid Ball
card.property: Ranged | Acid | 2d6 | d12 1-4 = Corrode, 5+ = Corrode

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Sometimes a simple splash can be as painful and effective as the heaviest hammerblow!

card.name: Arc Lightning
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 3d6 | d12 7-8 = Daze, 9+ = Stun | Ethereal, Unavoidable

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: His body hummed with blinding light as he discharged raw power. There was no way his foe could dodge the onslaught.

card.name: Blinding Flash
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Light | 2d6 | d12 4-9 = Daze, 10+ = Stun | Ethereal, Unavoidable, +2 vs. Nonliving Creature
Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Asyra, bathe me in your light and blind the heretics with your glory!" Lleki, Priestess of the White Tower.

card.name: Bolt of V'Tar
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 3d6 | d12 6-7 = Daze, 8+ = Stun | Ethereal
This attack gains the Mana Drain +X and Piercing +X traits. X is the number of V'Tar Orbs you control.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: V'Tar flowed to the Archmage, and he molded it into a bolt of power, like electricity yet somehow different and more sinister.

card.name: Chain Lightning
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 5d6 | d12 5-7 = Daze, 8+ = Stun | Ethereal

Each time Chain Lightning damages a target, it may attack another target. That target must be in LoS of the last target, and may be up to 1 zone away from that target. Each successive attack rolls 1 fewer attack dice, and subtracts 1 more from the effect roll. Chain Lightning can't attack the same target twice.

card.name: Devil's Trident
card.property: Ranged | Flame | 4d6 | d12 3-5 = Cripple, 6-8 = Cripple & Burn, 9+ = Burn | Piercing +2, Defrost

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Made of pure hellfire, each cursed point penetrates and sears. It is the symbol of demonic torment." - Nebuset Dragonsong

card.name: Dragon's Breath
card.property: Ranged | Flame | 4d6 | d12 3-9 = Burn, 10+ = 2 Burn | Defrost

At the end of the attack, as part of the same attack action, Dragon's Breath may attack a second target (similar to a Sweeping attack). The second target must be in an adjacent zone, 1 zone farther away than the first target. Both targets must be within range.

card.name: Electrify
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Lightning | 4d6 | d12 7-8 = Daze, 9+ = Stun | Ethereal, Unavoidable
Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The mage called lightning from the heavens, and nothing more was said."

card.name: Fireball
card.property: Ranged | Flame | 6d6 | d12 4-10 = Burn, 11+ = 2 Burn | Defrost

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "A classic of fire spells. Effective range, hard-hitting damage, extended burn. A well timed fireball can be the difference between victory and defeat." Master of Fire: A Primer of Spells

card.name: Firestorm
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Flame | 5d6 | d12 5-9 = Burn, 10+ = 2 Burn | Defrost, Unavoidable

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "When you have got to bring the burn to every single thing in your way, this is the spell to do it with. Let your enemies stack up, then take them down." Mastery of Fire: A Primer of Spells

card.name: Flameblast
card.property: Ranged | Flame | 4d6 | d12 7-10 = Burn, 11+ = 2 Burn | Unavoidable, Defrost

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The simplest of fire spells. If you cannot even summon this firey bolt, you are doomed to fail your training." Mastery of Fire: A Primer of Spells

card.name: Force Hammer
card.property: Ranged | 6d6 | d12 8+ = Slam | Ethereal, +2 vs. Corporeal Conjurations

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The Nameless One provides the tools. How we use them is up to us." - Ralnos the Offensive Mind

card.name: Geyser
card.property: Ranged | Hydro | 3d6 | d12 5+ = Daze | Unavoidable
During the Roll Dice Step of this attack, if the target has any Burn conditions on it, cancel this attack and remove all Burn conditions from the target instead.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Quite a useful spell, blasting enemies or extinguishing fires!" - First Scout, Emerson D'laak

card.name: Hail of Stones
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | 4d6 | d12 6-10 = Daze, 11+ = Stun | Unavoidable

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Throwing a rock will not deter an enemy. But throwing a hundred ricks will rout them!" - Gurmash, Orc Warmaster

card.name: Hurl Boulder
card.property: Ranged | 7d6 | d12 8+ = Slam

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Dropping a boulder on your foes is easy. Teaching it to fly like a bird first will take years of training." - Gurmash, Orc Warmaster

card.name: Hurl Meteorite
card.property: Ranged | 9d6 | d12 5-8 = Daze, 9+ = Stun

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "That IS a big rock", smiled Trokoth, as he dusted off his cloak. "Mind if I return the favor with a small rock of my own?"

card.name: Hurl Rock
card.property: Ranged | 5d6 | d12 9+ = Daze

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: And they say you cannot get blood from a stone!

card.name: Invisible Fist
card.property: Ranged | 4d6 | d12 8+ = Daze | Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Mordok invented the spell as an easy way to enforce discipline amongst his apprentices.

card.name: Jet Stream
card.property: Ranged | Wind | 2d6 | d12 4-10 = Push, 11+ = Push & Daze | Ethereal, +2 vs. Flying

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Any peasant can dig a trench and fill it with water. Show me one who can make a river of air." Thessial, Faculty of the Arcanum

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 5d6 | d12 6-7 = Daze, 8+ = Stun | Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "You see soldiers of Westlock. I see little lightning rods." Laddinfance, Primus of the White Spires

card.name: Luminous Blast
card.property: Ranged | Light | 5d6 | d12 4-10 = Daze, 11+ = Stun | Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: The fog and mirk receded, replaced by a searing white light. "Embrace your judgement!" Cassius roared as the power of the Dawnbreaker enveloped the undead crew of the Viridian Lace.

card.name: Pillar of Light
card.property: Ranged | Light | 2d6 | d12 4-10 = Daze, 11+ = Stun | Ethereal, +2 vs. Nonliving Creatures

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "The Dawnbreaker has cast his judgement upon thee, and it is vengeance!" Yarbyn, Paladin of Westlock

card.name: Ring of Fire

property.name: bAttack
property.value: {'name':'Ring of Fire','Spell':True,'source type':'Attack','Cost':9,'range type':'Ranged','range':[0,0],'Zone Attack':'Other','damage type':'Flame','dice':5,'effects':{7: ['Burn'], 11: ['Burn', 'Burn']},'Unavoidable':True,'Defrost':True}

card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Flame | 5d6 | d12 7-10 = Burn, 11+ = 2 Burn | Unavoidable, Defrost
Attacks all objects in the zone except the caster.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "Fire is a living thing, but it can be commanded into shapes through your will. A wall is simple, a ring difficult, but perhaps more useful." Mastery of Fire: A Primer of Spells

card.name: Sandstorm
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Wind | 2d6 | d12 4-6 = Push, 7-9 = Daze, 10+ = Push & Daze | Piercing +1, +2 vs. Flying, Unavoidable
If Pushed, roll for random direction.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "There is no shelter from this storm. You can flee before it or be buried under it." - Marshen, the Earthshaper

card.name: Shattering Strike
card.property: Quick | Melee | 4d6
Immediately before the Damage and Effects Step; Shattering Strike converts one normal damage into critical damage for every point of Armor defending Creature or Conjuration has.

card.name: Snowstorm
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Frost | 2d6 | d12 6-10 = Freeze, 11+ = 2 Freeze
Instead of taking damage, frost objects in this zone remove damage rolled on 2 dice.

card.name: Sunfire Burst
card.property: Ranged | Light | 2d6 | d12 6-7 = Daze, 8+ = Daze & Burn | Ethereal, Unavoidable, +2 vs. Nonliving Creatures

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: Not all holy men offer kind words and gentle smiles. Some come blazing with the cleansing fire of a thousand suns.

card.name: Surging Wave
card.property: Ranged | Hydro | 3d6 | d12 3-7 = Slam, 8+ = Push & Slam | Extinguish, Unavoidable

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: All the power of stone, all the flexibility of air.

card.name: Swell
card.property: Ranged | Hydro | 3d6 | d12 7+ = Push | Extinguish, Unavoidable

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "One moment, our men were knee deep at the shore, weapons thrusting into the waves at our foes. The next, the waters rose and crashed, and the soldiers just vanished." Gallymus

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.property: Ranged | Lightning | 6d6 | d12 4-6 = Daze, 7+ = Stun | Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: A shock of lightning, a peal of thunder.

card.name: Tidal Kick
card.property: Melee | Hydro | 3d6 | Extinguish
When Tidal Kick damages a creature, that creature gains the Slow trait until the end of the round. If this attack hits, you may pay 3 Ki to add a Push effect.

card.name: Tsunami
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | Hydro | 3d6 | d12 5+ = Push | Extinguish, Unavoidable

When Tsunami is cast, choose a direction. After the attack resolves, repeat the attack one zone farther away in the chosen direction. This continues until there are no farther zones. Flying creatures are immune to Tsunami.

card.name: V'Tarrian Energy Wave
card.property: Ranged | Zone Attack | 2d6 | Unavoidable, Ethereal
This attack rolls 1 extra attack die for each V'Tar Orb you control. It also affects any wall between the 2 targeted zones.

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "It called itself an "Archmage," and it did things with mana I've not seen before. The power he channeled..."

card.name: Windstorm
card.property: Ranged | Wind | 2d6 | d12 6+ = Push | Sweeping, Unavoidable, +2 vs. Flying, Ethereal

property.name: Flavor Text
property.i: "It's just a breeze they said, I envy such simple minds." - Laddinfance, Primus of the White Spire
